hero.title: The new standard in luxury travel

intro.title: Discover the world’s best travel experiences with Prince Collection
intro.content: Through our in-house travel agency and luxury travel Concierge service, we enable the modern luxury traveller to elevate their experience to new heights. Browse through our comprehensive resources, including real-life property reviews, guides to luxury travel programs, and the latest industry news to inspire your next trip.

news.title: The latest in luxury travel
news.content: Absorb our selection of in-depth content on all things luxury travel, spanning hotels and accommodations, flights, dining, cruises, and more.

book.title: Book your next hotel stay with us
book.content: Through Prince Collection’s access to the world’s best hotel preferred partner programs, you’ll enjoy exclusive benefits on your next luxury hotel stay at no additional cost. By booking with us, you receive:

list.title: Daily breakfast for two people
list.content: Enjoy complimentary breakfast for two at the hotel restaurant, lounge, or via in-room dining. Switch it up on consecutive mornings to experience them all.

list.title: $100 (USD) hotel credit
list.content: Use your $100 (USD) hotel credit towards dining, drinks, spa bookings, or other hotel facilities. Don’t worry – we’ll help you secure reservations in advance.

list.title: Welcome amenity
list.content: A complimentary bottle of wine, snacks, or a local gift will be awaiting your arrival, entirely customizable for your special occasion.

list.title: One-category room upgrade, subject to availability
list.content: Either at time of booking or upon arrival, we will take care of your upgrade from start to finish. You can be as hands-on as you prefer.

list.title: Early check-in/late check-out, subject to availability
list.content: Early arrival or late flight? Have your room be ready for you and enjoy it until you leave for the airport.

list.title: Property-specific 3rd/4th/5th Night Free promotions
list.content: Exclusive free night offers when booking with us, applied automatically. Qualifying hotels and promotions may change over time, but we’ll always help you secure the best rate.

exclusive.title: Exclusive deals and benefits through Prince Collection
exclusive.content: Book with Prince Collection and enjoy access to exclusive deals and benefits at luxury hotel brands, including Four Seasons, Rosewood, Mandarin Oriental, St. Regis, Waldorf Astoria, and Park Hyatt, as well as a wide range of independent boutique luxury properties.

reviews.title: Find inspiration
reviews.content: Join us on-property as we share our experiences at the world's best hotels and destinations, showcasing how Prince Collection’s benefits will elevate your experience.

concierge.title: Your luxury travel concierge
concierge.content: Concierge by Prince Collection is designed exclusively for the most discerning of travellers seeking the world’s best travel experiences, all handled seamlessly by our Concierge team. As time is your most valuable asset, we’ll help you unlock an extraordinary journey without lifting a finger courtesy of our white-glove Concierge service.

guides.title: Sharpen your knowledge
guides.content: Learn more about the travel brands and preferred partner programs we work with to curate and deliver the best possible experience for you.

newsletter_cta.title: Our best offers, straight to your inbox
newsletter_cta.content: Sign up and get the best travel information delivered straight to your inbox. You'll receive updates about new property openings, unique experiences, exclusive promotions, and much more.

hero.title: Your luxury travel concierge
hero.content: Built for those seeking the world’s best travel experiences, Concierge by Prince Collection is a white-glove service designed exclusively for the most discerning travellers. Our Concierge team seamlessly handles all aspects of your experience, helping unlock an extraordinary journey without lifting a finger.

section1.title: Your travel optimized
section1.content: Concierge by Prince Collection is different from traditional concierge services. Our travel support is personally tailored to the needs of every client. We handle travel arrangements from start to finish, while offering the added advantage of optimizing loyalty programs and elite status on the client’s behalf.

section2.title:
What does Concierge
by Prince Collection offer?
section2.content: With our unparalleled travel expertise and world-class service principles, we deliver optimized travel outcomes for our clients over the course of a comprehensive annual engagement.

list.title: Comprehensive onboarding & annual travel strategy
list.content: We conduct a thorough evaluation of clients' credit cards, elite status, and travel preferences. This process aids us in developing a full travel strategy to optimize clients' travel experiences over the course of the year.

list.title: Customized trip booking
list.content: Clients communicate their travel requirements to their account manager, who will then research and suggest the best flight and hotel options, keeping in mind the clients' preferences, travel goals, and points balances. Clients only need to sign off on trip proposals, after which the account manager proceeds with the bookings.

list.title: 24/7 emergency travel support
list.content: Our Concierge team is available 24/7 to assist in emergency travel situations. In case of flight cancellations, delays, missed connections, or any other unexpected circumstances, our team adeptly navigates airline systems to achieve the best possible outcomes.

section3.title: Our Guarantee
section3.content: Concierge by Prince Collection is tailored specifically for high net-worth individuals and businesses in pursuit of unique and exclusive experiences. Recognizing that time is your most precious asset, our specialty is navigating the intricacies of travel to guarantee a smooth and remarkable adventure from beginning to end.

list.title: Save time
list.content: We take over the time-consuming task of planning, optimizing, and managing travel, allowing you to focus on other priorities.

list.title: Maximize loyalty
list.content: With our expertise in loyalty points and elite status, we ensure you make the most of your travels while flying the world’s best airlines and staying at world-class hotels.

list.title: Peace of mind
list.content: Our 24/7 emergency support gives you the assurance that help is always available, no matter what unexpected situations arise during your travels.

list.title: Customized service
list.content: Each travel strategy and trip is meticulously planned according to your preferences and goals, offering a fully personalized experience.

book.title: Submit an Inquiry
book.content: Interested in Concierge by Prince Collection? Fill in the form below and one of our specialists will get in touch with you.

hero.title: What is Prince Collection?
hero.content: Through our in-house travel agency and luxury travel Concierge service, Prince Collection enables the modern luxury traveller to elevate their experience to new heights.

section1.title: Find Your Travel inspiration
section1.content: Our travel reviews set us apart – we send our advisors to the most unique destinations worldwide and curate our reviews and recommendations directly from personal experience. Plus, stay up to date with the latest news and absorb our in-depth guides on all things luxury travel.

section2.title: Book Your Next Trip
section2.content: We are here for every step in the luxury travel journey. We’ll book you in the best hotels worldwide, along with exclusive perks just for booking with us. We also offer a luxury travel Concierge for those who need a completely hands-off travel experience.

list.title: Book your hotel
list.content: Concierge by Prince Collection is designed exclusively for the most discerning of travellers seeking the world’s best travel experiences, all handled seamlessly by our Concierge team. As time is your most valuable asset, we’ll help you unlock an extraordinary journey without lifting a finger courtesy of our white-glove Concierge service.

testimonials.name: Yuanlin
testimonials.content: Hi Prince collection, thanks for the info. Really appreciated the help from your team to get me the 3 nights for 2 deal at the time of booking.

testimonials.name: Sanjay
testimonials.content: I wanted to thank you for all your help on my current trip. You made the experience amazing and I really appreciated your support when we ran into that hiccup and had to cancel Bali. Thanks again.

testimonials.name: Marci
testimonials.content: Hi Nancy, you are so amazing. Thank you for your fabulous reassurance! Thank you for EVERYTHING and for helping me save a substantial amount of $$. Thank you thank you!

faq.title: Answers to our most Frequently Asked Questions
faq.content: Prince Collection’s Travel Concierge is designed exclusively for companies and individuals who require exclusive travel arrangements handled for them.

intro.title: What is Prince Collection?
intro.content: Prince Collection is a distinguished brand launched by Prince of Travel, dedicated to offering bespoke luxury experiences. Our portfolio includes a premier travel agency among other high-end travel services and products, designed to elevate the travel experiences of discerning globetrotters around the world.

intro.title: How is princecollection.com related to princeoftravel.com?
intro.content: Prince Collection is a brand extension of Prince of Travel, leveraging the latter’s expertise and reputation in the travel industry to offer specialized luxury travel products and services. While Prince of Travel focuses on maximizing travel rewards, Prince Collection is dedicated to curating bespoke travel experiences that cater to the luxury segment of the market.

intro.title: What future initiatives can we expect from Prince Collection?
intro.content: Looking ahead, Prince Collection is poised to expand its offerings to embrace a wider array of bespoke travel experiences. While luxury train journeys and exclusive hotel stays will remain a cornerstone of our offerings, we are exploring new partnerships and destinations to provide our clients with an even broader spectrum of exceptional travel options. Expect innovations in personalized travel, community engagement projects, and initiatives aimed at enhancing the sustainability of luxury travel. Our goal is to continuously push the boundaries of what luxury travel can be, ensuring our clients have access to unparalleled experiences that are as enriching as they are exclusive.

travel_agency_faq_hero.title: Travel Agency FAQ
travel_agency_faq_hero.content: Discover unparalleled luxury with Prince Collection’s Travel Agency, which specializes in booking exclusive, personally tailored hotel stays for you.

travel_agency.title: Do you charge any booking fees?
content: No! We charge no additional fees for handling bookings. You’ll pay the same price as the best flexible rate offered by the hotel, all while enjoying extra benefits.
The fee structure is subject to change.

travel_agency.title: How are you able to offer these additional benefits?
content: Luxury hotel groups offer these additional benefits and promotions to clients of the world’s leading travel agencies in order to capture significant volumes of guest spending through these agencies.

travel_agency.title: What rates will I pay when booking with Prince Collection?
content: In most cases, you’ll pay the same rate as the best flexible (i.e., fully refundable) rate offered directly by the hotel.

These rates may be higher than member-exclusive rates, prepaid rates, corporate rates, or other specific rate types outside of the best flexible rate, so you’ll want to weigh up the difference in rates against the additional benefits you receive.

In some cases, such as during property-specific 3rd/4th/5th Night Free promotions, booking with Prince Collection can result in paying lower effective rates compared to the best publicly available rate.

travel_agency.title: Will I get elite status benefits, points, and qualifying nights?
content: Yes! The benefits you receive when booking hotels with Prince Collection are in addition to the benefits you’d get as an elite member of a hotel loyalty program.

Furthermore, Prince Collection bookings are eligible to earn points and qualifying nights within hotel elite status programs, helping you get closer to your next points redemption or a higher elite tier.

travel_agency.title: How does the booking process work?
content: Submit an inquiry via the booking form to get started.
Our travel advisors will work with you to identify the best property for your needs and help you understand the benefits you’ll receive.
When you’re ready to book, we will collect your credit card information via a PCI-compliant submission process and pass it along to the property to guarantee your booking.

After your booking is confirmed, we will communicate with the hotel on your behalf with respect to room preferences, upgrade requests, special occasions, etc., to ensure you have the best possible experience during your stay.

travel_agency.title: How does Prince Collection ensure the quality of its travel experiences?
content: Quality is at the core of everything we do at Prince Collection. We handpick our partners based on rigorous standards of excellence, from luxury accommodations to elite concierge services. Our team of travel experts continuously explores new destinations and experiences to ensure our recommendations meet the high expectations associated with our brand. Furthermore, we value and act upon the feedback from our clients to constantly refine and enhance our offerings.

concierge_faq_hero.title: Prince Collection Concierge
concierge_faq_hero.content: Prince Collection’s Travel Concierge is designed exclusively for high net worth individuals and companies looking for white-glove travel experiences. Time is your most valuable asset, so Prince Collection’s Concierge ensures a seamless and extraordinary journey from start to finish.

concierge.title: What is a luxury travel concierge service?
content: A luxury travel concierge tailors every trip detail to client preferences, offering exclusive accommodations, unique experiences, and VIP treatment for a seamless, high-end travel experience.

concierge.title: How does a luxury travel concierge differ from a regular travel agent?
content: Luxury concierges offer bespoke, high-end services and exclusive access on an ongoing basis with 24/7 travel support, while regular agents provide standard travel packages and bookings.

concierge.title: Who can benefit from using a luxury travel concierge service?
content: Anyone seeking personalized, high-end travel experiences with exclusive access and VIP treatment can benefit from a luxury travel concierge, including businesses and high net worth individuals.

concierge.title: How can I contact my travel concierge while abroad?
content: You will begin your relationship with your concierge upon enrollment, and you will have access 24/7 via text, phone, email, or your preferred contact method.

concierge.title: How do you tailor travel experiences to individual tastes and preferences?
content: In the enrollment process, our  concierge team will get to know you and your travel preferences on a deep level. As the relationship progresses, we learn your needs, wants, preferences, and more as we deliver you personalized travel experiences.

concierge.title: Can you accommodate special requests, such as dietary restrictions or accessibility needs?
content: Of course. The Prince Collection concierge is here to create your personalized travel itineraries, which includes your dietary and accessibility needs.

booking.title: Book with Us
booking.content: Submit a booking inquiry for your next hotel stay below, and one of our travel advisors will be in touch within 2 business days.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: We invite you to get in touch with us with any inquiries. Submit your inquiry here, and a Prince Collection travel advisor will be in touch to explore all the travel possibilities that lie at your fingertips.

footer.title: Prince Collection
footer.content: Prince Collection is a full-service luxury travel brand featuring an in-house travel agency and travel concierge. We are a leading resource delivering on-site reviews, comprehensive guides, and the latest industry news.
copyright: Prince Collection is a licensed travel agency, registered in the province of Ontario, Canada.
